mil7.5.4:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vicchikassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.4:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, vicchiko naṅgulāvudho naṅgulaṁ ussāpetvā carati;
mil7.5.4:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ñāṇāvudhena bhavitabbaṁ, ñāṇaṁ ussāpetvā viharitabbaṁ.
mil7.5.4:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vicchikassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
